_comment: Additional EU compliance norms not covered in main EU norms database. Includes new 2024-2025 regulations, specific product directives, and emerging compliance requirements. Complements data/norms.json.

norms.name: Digital Services Act (DSA)
norms.applies_to: Online platforms, intermediary services, digital services
norms.description: Comprehensive regulation for digital services establishing obligations for content moderation, transparency, user protection. Applies to platforms, marketplaces, search engines. Mandatory from February 2024.

norms.name: Digital Markets Act (DMA)
norms.applies_to: Large digital platforms designated as gatekeepers
norms.description: Ensures fair competition in digital markets by imposing obligations on gatekeeper platforms. Covers app stores, search engines, messaging, social networks.

norms.name: AI Act (Artificial Intelligence Act)
norms.applies_to: AI systems and general-purpose AI models
norms.description: World's first comprehensive AI regulation. Risk-based approach: prohibited practices, high-risk systems requiring conformity assessment, transparency obligations. Enforcement begins 2025-2027.

norms.name: Regulation on Cybersecurity Requirements for Products with Digital Elements (CRA)
norms.applies_to: Hardware and software products with digital elements
norms.description: Mandatory cybersecurity requirements for connected products. Covers vulnerability management, security updates, incident reporting. Expected enforcement 2025-2027. Major impact on IoT and software.

norms.name: Machinery Directive
norms.applies_to: Machinery, interchangeable equipment, safety components, lifting equipment
norms.description: Core directive for machinery safety. Covers essential health and safety requirements, risk assessment, CE marking. Being replaced by Machinery Regulation 2023/1230 from 2027.

norms.name: Machinery Regulation (replacing 2006/42/EC)
norms.description: Replaces Machinery Directive from January 2027. Updates essential requirements for digitalization, AI, robotics. Extended scope including safety-related software.

norms.name: Toy Safety Directive
norms.description: Comprehensive safety requirements for toys including mechanical/physical properties, flammability, chemical substances, electrical properties, hygiene, radioactivity.

norms.name: Toy Safety - Mechanical and Physical Properties
norms.description: Harmonized standard for mechanical and physical properties of toys. Covers small parts, sharp edges, strength, stability. Referenced by Toy Safety Directive.

norms.name: Toy Safety - Flammability
norms.description: Flammability requirements and test methods for toys. Categories include beards, costumes, soft-filled toys, hair.

norms.name: Toy Safety - Migration of Certain Elements
norms.description: Limits for migration of hazardous elements (heavy metals, etc.) from toy materials. Covers 19 elements including lead, cadmium, mercury.

norms.name: Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) Regulation
norms.applies_to: Equipment designed to be worn or held for protection against risks
norms.description: Regulates design and manufacture of PPE. Three risk categories with different conformity assessment procedures. Includes safety goggles, gloves, protective clothing.

norms.name: Medical Devices Regulation (MDR)
norms.description: Comprehensive medical device regulation replacing directives 93/42/EEC and 90/385/EEC. Stricter requirements, clinical evaluation, post-market surveillance. Fully applicable since May 2021.

norms.name: In Vitro Diagnostic Medical Devices Regulation (IVDR)
norms.description: Regulation for IVD medical devices. Risk-based classification, performance evaluation requirements. Full application from May 2022 with transition periods.

norms.name: Pyrotechnic Articles Directive
norms.applies_to: Fireworks, theatrical pyrotechnic articles, pyrotechnic articles for technical purposes
norms.description: Safety requirements for pyrotechnic articles. Classification system, age restrictions, labeling requirements.

norms.name: Recreational Craft Directive
norms.applies_to: Recreational craft 2.5-24m, personal watercraft, marine engines
norms.description: Essential requirements for recreational craft and personal watercraft. Covers design, construction, propulsion, emissions.

norms.name: Vehicle Safety Regulation - Advanced Driver Assistance Systems
norms.description: Mandatory advanced safety features for vehicles including emergency braking, lane keeping, driver drowsiness detection, event data recorder. Phased implementation 2022-2024.

norms.name: Vehicle Type-Approval Regulation
norms.applies_to: Motor vehicles and their trailers, systems, components
norms.description: EU type-approval framework for vehicles. Includes market surveillance, recall procedures, cybersecurity and software update provisions.

norms.name: Marine Equipment Directive
norms.description: Requirements for marine equipment to be placed on board EU ships. Ensures compliance with international maritime conventions.

norms.name: Pressure Equipment Directive (PED)
norms.applies_to: Pressure equipment and assemblies with max allowable pressure >0.5 bar
norms.description: Safety requirements for pressure equipment. Risk-based categories, conformity assessment procedures. Covers vessels, piping, safety accessories.

norms.name: Lifts Directive
norms.applies_to: Lifts and safety components for lifts
norms.description: Essential health and safety requirements for lifts permanently serving buildings and constructions. Includes passenger and goods lifts.

norms.name: General Product Safety Regulation (GPSR)
norms.applies_to: All consumer products not covered by specific sectoral legislation
norms.description: Replaces GPSD 2001/95/EC. Strengthened safety requirements, online marketplace obligations, product recalls, Safety Gate. Mandatory from December 2024.

norms.name: Battery Due Diligence and Supply Chain Requirements
norms.description: Due diligence obligations for battery supply chain including social and environmental risk assessment. Digital battery passport requirement from 2027.

norms.name: Ecodesign for Sustainable Products Regulation (ESPR)
norms.applies_to: Physical goods placed on EU market
norms.description: Replaces Ecodesign Directive 2009/125/EC. Broader scope beyond energy-related products. Includes durability, reusability, recyclability, digital product passports. Implementation ongoing 2024-2030.

norms.name: Right to Repair - Common Rules on Repair of Goods
norms.description: Promotes repair over replacement. Obligations for repair information, spare parts availability, reasonable pricing. Applies after legal guarantee period. Effective 2025-2026.

norms.name: Single-Use Plastics Directive
norms.description: Reduces impact of certain plastic products on environment. Bans specific single-use plastics, marking requirements, extended producer responsibility.

norms.name: Persistent Organic Pollutants (POPs) Regulation
norms.description: Prohibits or restricts production, use, release of persistent organic pollutants. Includes limits for substances in products and waste.

norms.name: Fluorinated Greenhouse Gases Regulation
norms.applies_to: Products containing or relying on fluorinated gases
norms.description: Phasing down HFCs and other F-gases. Restrictions on products containing F-gases, leak checking, recovery requirements. Significant impact on refrigeration, air conditioning.

norms.name: End-of-Life Vehicles Directive
norms.description: Requirements for vehicle recyclability, hazardous substance restrictions, producer responsibility for end-of-life treatment. Being revised in 2024-2025.

norms.name: Packaging and Packaging Waste Regulation (PPWR)
norms.applies_to: All packaging placed on EU market
norms.description: Replaces DIR-94/62/EC. Comprehensive packaging requirements: design for recyclability, recycled content obligations, reduction targets, reuse systems. Phased implementation 2025-2030.

norms.name: Foreign Subsidies Regulation
norms.applies_to: Companies benefiting from foreign subsidies in M&A or public procurement
norms.description: Addresses distortive effects of foreign subsidies in EU internal market. Notification obligations for large transactions and public tenders.

norms.name: Market Surveillance and Product Compliance Regulation
norms.applies_to: Products subject to EU harmonization legislation
norms.description: Strengthened market surveillance framework. Union testing facilities, enhanced customs cooperation, obligations for online marketplaces, economic operators.

norms.name: Markets in Crypto-Assets Regulation (MiCA)
norms.description: Comprehensive regulation for crypto-assets and service providers. Authorization requirements, operational standards, consumer protection. Applicable from 2024-2025.

norms.name: Corporate Sustainability Reporting Directive (CSRD)
norms.description: Extends sustainability reporting obligations. Detailed disclosure on environmental, social, governance matters. Phased application from 2024. Affects products indirectly through supply chain.

norms.name: Deforestation-Free Products Regulation
norms.applies_to: Products linked to deforestation (cattle, cocoa, coffee, palm oil, soy, wood, rubber, derivatives)
norms.description: Prohibits products linked to deforestation from EU market. Due diligence obligations, traceability, geolocation requirements. Mandatory from December 2024.

norms.name: Mercury Regulation
norms.description: Prohibits manufacture, import, export of mercury-added products. Includes dental amalgam restrictions, measuring devices, lamps, batteries, switches.

norms.name: Persistent Organic Pollutants (Updated)
norms.description: Bans or restricts POPs under Stockholm Convention. Recently updated to include additional PFAS substances. Affects coatings, textiles, plastics.

norms.name: Inland Transport of Dangerous Goods
norms.applies_to: Dangerous goods transported by road, rail, inland waterway
norms.description: Adopts ADR (road), RID (rail), ADN (inland waterway) requirements. Affects lithium battery shipments, chemicals, flammable materials.

norms.name: Technical Documentation for RoHS Compliance
norms.applies_to: Electrical and electronic equipment subject to RoHS
norms.description: Standard for assessing electrical and electronic equipment regarding restriction of hazardous substances. Defines technical documentation requirements.

norms.name: Specification for Marking of Cables
norms.description: Requirements for identification and marking of insulated cables. Includes color coding, labeling, traceability.

norms.name: Electric Cables - Low Voltage
norms.description: Series of standards for electric cables for rated voltages up to 450/750V. Common for appliance cords, internal wiring.

norms.name: Ingress Protection (IP) Rating
norms.description: Classification system for degree of protection provided by enclosures against ingress of solid objects, dust, water. IP ratings (IP67, IP68, etc.).

norms.name: Environmental Testing
norms.description: Series of standards for environmental testing including temperature, humidity, vibration, shock, salt spray. Used for reliability and durability testing.

norms.name: Household Appliances - Safety - General Requirements
norms.description: General safety requirements for household appliances. Covers electrical, mechanical, thermal hazards. Part 1 of comprehensive multi-part standard.

norms.name: Household Appliances - Safety - Particular Requirements
norms.description: Part 2 series with specific requirements for different appliance types (vacuum cleaners, coffee makers, heaters, etc.). Over 100 parts covering specific products.

norms.name: Medical Electrical Equipment - General Requirements for Safety
norms.description: International standard for safety and effectiveness of medical electrical equipment. Risk management approach, essential performance requirements.

norms.name: Medical Electrical Equipment - EMC Requirements
norms.description: Collateral standard for electromagnetic compatibility of medical electrical equipment. Stricter than general EMC directive due to safety-critical nature.

norms.name: Medical Device Software - Lifecycle Processes
norms.description: Software lifecycle requirements for medical device software. Risk-based approach with safety classes A, B, C. Required for MDR compliance.

norms.name: Railway Applications - Electronic Equipment
norms.applies_to: Electronic equipment for railway rolling stock
norms.description: Requirements for electronic equipment used on railway vehicles. Covers harsh environmental conditions, vibration, EMC.

norms.name: Railway Applications - Fire Protection
norms.applies_to: Materials and components for railway vehicles
norms.description: Fire protection requirements for railway vehicles. Material fire behavior, smoke toxicity, fire barriers. Multi-part standard.

norms.name: Railway Applications - EMC
norms.description: EMC requirements specific to railway applications. Covers rolling stock, signaling, infrastructure. Harsh electromagnetic environment considerations.
